![](data:image/webp;base64,)

## Post type Templates

The post type editor Templates tab shows the list of templates that can be designed for this post type.

## Base templates

Base templates are the default templates that are used to display posts of this type

- **Single post** Design of the individual single post page
- **Preview card** Design of the individual card that appears in the [post feed/search results](docs.getvoxel.io_articles_post-feed-vx-widget_.md)
- **Archive page** The design of the archive for this post type
- **Create post** The front-end post submission page for this post type

Apart from the base templates, you can create additional templates which you can apply based on different conditions.

## Single post

To create additional single post templates that are used under certain conditions, you can create them under Single post tab. You can specify the name of the template and apply conditions when the template should be utilized using [Voxel visibility rules](docs.getvoxel.io_articles_visibility-rules-condition-and-restrict-content_.md).

Voxel checks the template conditions by their order (top to bottom) so if there are multiple templates that can meet certain conditions, the first one that meets the conditions is used.

You can change the order of these templates via drag and drop.

## Preview cards

Under this sub-tab you can create additional preview card templates which can replace the base preview card template in various part of the site. When creating a preview card template, that template can be selected in the [Post feed (VX)](docs.getvoxel.io_articles_post-feed-vx-widget_.md) options. If the Post feed is connected to a search form, then the template can be selected on the [Search form (VX)](docs.getvoxel.io_articles_search-form-vx-widget_.md) widget options in Elementor.

## Other

Under this tab, you can create additional post type templates to be used by the [Template tabs (VX)](docs.getvoxel.io_articles_template-tabs-vx_.md) and [Print template (VX)](docs.getvoxel.io_articles_print-template-vx-widget_.md) widgets
